attributes.action: Debate the so-called ‘facts’ of the Referendum campaign and note the lies.
attributes.additional_details: People are only now learning the facts of what leaving the EU will mean... the financial chaos and loss of regional funding. They are learning that there will be no new money for the NHS or protection for our borders. They are seeing our last industries pack up to leave. Many people that get the most out of EU membership through its support in Wales, Cornwall and the North have been deceived about the impact of taking Britain out of the European Union. We need a list of facts to trust.
attributes.background: We need a record, in Parliament and the press, of all campaign and media distortion, retractions and lies to guide people who voted on dishonest information and those who need to sort out the current economic and political chaos. We need to see what is left of democracy, once the lies are logged.
